description: Detects office suit applications communicating to target systems on uncommon ports
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Other ports can be used, apply additional filters accordingly
name: Suspicious Office Outbound Connections
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Nn][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd][Pp][Aa][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (NOT destination.port:(139 OR 443 OR 445 OR 80)))
